Driving Directions

Driving Directions

Easy to fall in love with this Mid-Century Modern HOME, an oasis of privacy surrounded by woodlands on 2 peaceful acres with your own back yard pond for skipping rocks and winter ice skating fun! Soaring ceilings & large windows bring in year-round natural light complementing the warm tongue/groove cedar ceilings and exposed beams. A floor plan for easy living including first-floor primary suite w/vaulted ceiling, skylight, triple closets & full bath with floating double vanity. Enjoy the Chefâs kitchen with peninsula & high-end SS appliances open to the window-filled dining room and a living room highlight by its floor-to-ceiling fireplace w/floating hearth and sliders accessing the spacious outdoor deck. Walk out lower level finds a large fireplaced family room, 3 generous sized bedrooms, a full bath with double vanity and laundry room. The convenient location nearby to hiking trails, Town Center, Concord Center & commuting routes makes this a property you'll want to call HOME!
